title: Sangmi
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Busy place at 大阪市大阪府大阪市阿倍野区阿倍野筋２丁目４−３９ that's health conscious in cooking and uses very limited to no dairy and egg, but does use dashi (fish broth) in cooking. Usually 2 lunch options, can upgrade your meal with additional seasonal vegetables or extra genmai rice. From 3pm it's less busy and double as a cafe providing an array of main dishes, desserts, and drinks. Sells genmai, salt-and-black-sesame furikake, cookies, salad dressings, tofu mayonnaise, and other goodies.
